casebody.data:
Harry G. FROMBERG, as Trustee of Grand National Pictures, Inc., Appellant, v. James A. DAVIDSON, as Trustee of Educational Pictures, Inc., Appellee. No. 187. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 17, 1941. Julius M. Arnstein, of New York City, for appellant. A. Walter Socolow, of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed on opinion below, In re Educational Pictures, 34 F.Supp. 807.
